directions: Melt butter in a saucepan over low heat; add marshmallows and cook and stir until melted. Remove from heat and add chocolate crisp rice cereal and stir until coated.
Spread marshamallow mixture between two pieces of waxed paper; flatten using a rolling pin. Form the flattened mixture into 3 cone shapes and let set for 1 hour.
ingredients: 6 cups chocolate crisp rice cereal (such as Kellogg's® Cocoa Krispies®)
title: Cocoa Krispies® Ice Cream Cones
